Full DVD goes to Movies DVDR :) !
Moved.

Hi Seems to be problem with episode 3 in that you can't turn the subs off. You can with all the other episodes. also the disc size isn't the same as the other 4. Haven't checked to see if anythig is missing yet. Will update. All the others are great by the way. Thanks for the hard work.
It's just the subs that are hardcoded onto episode 3 but nothing is missing.
Raar, ik vind episode 3 niet eens terug. Enkel episode 4 staat er op blijkbaar.

I had a problem with EP3 while trying to burn with CloneDVD2 but resolved the issue by creating the disc using Cyberlink PowerDirector.

Regards..,
